languages.text: Эскортный фрегат "Праведное искупление" был снят с орбиты с простым приказом: "Умереть во славу Империума". Эвакуировав весь экипаж, кроме тысячи человек, необходимых для функционирования основных систем, "Праведное искупление" отправилось в последнюю атаку.

traits.locale_text: Эскортный фрегат "Праведное искупление" был снят с орбиты с простым приказом: "Умереть во славу Империума". Эвакуировав весь экипаж, кроме нескольких тысяч человек, необходимых для функционирования основных систем, и отгрузив ценное оборудование на остальные корабли флота, "Праведное искупление" отправился в свой последний вояж.

languages.text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

languages.text: “正义救赎”号护卫舰脱离了星轨。这艘船收到的命令很简单——为帝国的荣耀牺牲。绝大部分船员都已经撤离，只剩一千多人负责操作飞船的所有主要系统，他们注定在劫难逃。在这之后，正义救赎号进行了最后的攻击。
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

traits.locale_text: “正义救赎”号护卫舰脱离了星轨。这艘船收到的命令很简单——为帝国的荣耀牺牲。绝大部分船员都已经撤离，只剩一千多人负责操作飞船的所有主要系统，他们注定在劫难逃。在这之后，正义救赎号进行了最后的攻击。

languages.text: La frégate d'escorte « Délivrance impartiale » a reçu l'ordre de quitter l'orbite et de se sacrifier pour la gloire de l'Imperium. Une fois l'équipage évacué, hormis un millier d'âmes condamnées à rester à bord pour faire fonctionner les systèmes principaux du vaisseau, la frégate a entamé son ultime assaut.
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

traits.locale_text: La frégate d'escorte « Délivrance impartiale » a reçu l'ordre de quitter l'orbite et de se sacrifier pour la gloire de l'Imperium. Une fois l'équipage évacué, hormis un millier d'âmes condamnées à rester à bord pour faire fonctionner les systèmes principaux du vaisseau, la frégate a entamé son ultime assaut.

languages.text: 護衛フリゲート艦「正義の贖罪」は、帝国の栄光のために死ねという単純な命令とともに軌道上から排除された。船の主要システムを操作することを命じられた何千もの魂をクルーが避難させた後、正義の贖罪は最後の攻撃を開始した。
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

traits.locale_text: 護衛フリゲート艦「正義の贖罪」は、帝国の栄光のために死ねという単純な命令とともに軌道上から排除された。船の主要システムを操作することを命じられた何千もの魂をクルーが避難させた後、正義の贖罪は最後の攻撃を開始した。

languages.text: La fragata de escolta Redención Justiciera salió de órbita con una orden sencilla: Morir por la gloria del Imperium. La tripulación fue evacuada, a excepción de los pocos miles condenados a dirigir los sistemas esenciales, y la Redención Justiciera lanzó su último ataque.
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

traits.locale_text: La fragata de escolta Redención Justiciera salió de órbita con una orden sencilla: Morir por la gloria del Imperium. La tripulación fue evacuada, a excepción de los pocos miles condenados a dirigir los sistemas esenciales, y la Redención Justiciera lanzó su último ataque.

languages.text: Die Eskortfregatte Rechtschaffene Erlösung wurde durch einen simplen Befehl aus dem Orbit genommen: für den Ruhm des Imperiums zu sterben. Eintausend Seelen wurden dazu verdammt, die Primärsysteme des Schiffs zu bedienen, der Rest der Crew wurde evakuiert. Sodann begann die Rechtschaffene Erlösung ihren letzten Angriff.
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.

Eintausend Seelen wurden dazu verdammt, die Primärsysteme des Schiffs zu bedienen, der Rest der Crew wurde evakuiert. Sodann begann die Rechtschaffene Erlösung ihren letzten Angriff.

languages.text: Refakatçi fırkateyn Efdal Kefaret'e tek bir emir verildi: İmparatorluk'un bekası uğruna ölmek için yörüngeden ayrılacaktı. Geminin birincil sistemlerini yönetmeye mahkûm bin ruh hariç tüm mürettebat tahliye edildi. Sonrasında Efdal Kefaret, son saldırısını gerçekleştirdi.
languages.original_text: The escort frigate Righteous Redemption was taken out of orbit with a simple order: to die for the glory of the Imperium. After the crew had evacuated save for the thousand souls who had been condemned to operate the ship's primary systems, the Righteous Redemption commenced her final attack.
